title: Trade Agreement
blocka: Action: Trade a number of dice up to faction disposition rating.
blockb: Special: May only trade once each season.

title: Resource Gathering
blocka: Action: Add dice to any one resource pool until it equals the given resource track.

title: Development Research
blocka: Action: Purchase one available development. If put into play immediately, ignore any play cost.

title: Amber Lodge
blockb: Action: Character spends 8 progress to remove one condition.

title: Strategic Investments
blocka: Action: Spend 4 fortune to place one progress.
blockb: Immediate: Spend 3 progress to increase any disposition or resource track by one.
